phrases: Sunakawa-kun, why not come see a movie with us?
You like books and movies, right?
I do not really have any cash on me.
Then, I guess I will borrow money...
I am a first-year in high school.
It is almost fall, but right now,
it is the middle of springtime for me!
Did you really see the killer?
All the streetlights in that area were out because a bolt of lightning
The ending was different than the book,
Anyway, when did the killer die?
And he was not the killer.
Sunakawa-kun, do you find mountains fun?
So, Suna, do you find mountains fun?
Well... I do not really go mountain climbing.
We will take a break there!
I am not that tired, though
It is the right date, yep.
I would no idea this was about that.
You are perceptive, so we did a pretty good job
I did not expect this at all,
so I am not sure how to react.
You get cold easily, do not you?
You are always burrowed under the covers until morning.
Sometimes, I cannot sleep because my feet are too hot,
so I put them up on the windows to cool them down.
You have a high body temperature!
You look great in that uniform.
I wonder if it would bulk me up if I drank it.
I wonder if I would be able to beat egg whites in a single minute.
If I bulked up, would you still like me?
I would, even if you bulked up.
One orange juice and one iced milk tea.
The tray looks like a plate with him.
The manager asked that part-timer not to quit,
so he only works when he has time.
I hear he has a lot of fans.
That is right, I am Gouda Takeo.
I do not mean any harm.
Ousaki University Student ID Oda Hayato
I did not mean to interrupt you at work.
Oh, so it is one of her friends.
she said she was coming home for the long weekend.
What the hell do you think you are doing to Takeo?!
I told you I have feelings for you.
That is why I am here.
I wanted to see for myself the man you have feelings for.
Wait, that is the one, right?
It is not that there is another with the same name?
Do you have a problem with that?
I just did not expect him to be that kind of guy.
I made a mistake and talked to your brother first.
So he is the one who told you that you look like a beautiful flower?
And the girl with him is his girlfriend, Yamato-san?
My heart's already been broken, okay?
Just go back to Nagoya already!
I want to have a proper talk with Takeo-kun.
I need to know exactly what kind of man he is.
I want to know what kind of man you fell in love with.
Let me have that much, okay?
Takeo-kun's the reason why you turned me down.
You will just make things more complicated...
I will take you to the station.
Sunakawa-san, how did you know that is where I would be?
You are the one who sent me a text that said you were going to see Takeo!
I am glad I got to see his sister.
The last time she came was for Suna's dad.
She really helped me out last time...
Um, she gave me advice about you and stuff.
I would like to thank her somehow...
Maybe I can bake her something.
I am sure she would like that!
Now that I think about it, I wonder who that guy was.
Seemed like he was a friend of hers.
Oh, I will have some of that coffee.
How long are you staying this time?
Yeah, I took him to the station just now.
By the way, how long has Takeo been working there?
It was a pretty big turn-on.
Where can I take Yamato with my paycheck?
It is kind of expensive, though.
One time in junior high, I came over, and she was in just her jammies.
She did not seem to mind,
Have some milk while you wait.
but when she is here, I should not storm over whenever I want.
Takeo, I am sorry for earlier.
Well, it is more like we are in the same seminar...
I am sorry he bothered you.
No, I acted poorly toward him, too,
because I thought he was hassling Suna.
So, what is the problem, Takeo?
You wanted to talk to Makoto about something, right?
Well, I asked Yamato to go to MM Land,
but she just sounded awfully half-hearted...
but at the same time, she did not want to.
You said something similar last time, too
I think something is going on.
Let us have tea tomorrow with her.
I will casually check in with her.
He needs a lot of help, does not he?
Do not you go worrying about me!
It is not like that anymore.
I want to help them, you know.
They are a really good match.
I want them to be happy.
Do you prefer tea over coffee?
You are such a kid, Takeo.
Have you ever been to MM Land?
Right, it would be weird to fish around, instead of just asking.
She knows what she is doing.
Then why not go with Takeo?
Um, I will not go with Takeo-kun.
Are you holding back because it is expensive?
Guess you are ending up asking her yourself, anyway...
But I just do not want to go there with you.
After we parted ways at the station,
I went up on the Skytree.
I am sorry for being rude to you yesterday.
I did not know you were a friend of hers.
Sunakawa-san said I am a friend of hers.
I have told her I love her.
Oh, is that why you came from Nagoya?
Suddenly, I am starting to like him.
Sunakawa-san has someone else in her heart.
Who would do that to her?
I guess that sort of thing can happen.
If you spill any more beans, consider yourself dead.
Hey, so is the reason you do not want to go to MM Land that jinx
that says if you go there on a date, you will break up?
Well, that sort of jinx is common.
I did not even know about that...
I do not pay any attention to stuff like that,
but there are athletes and others who do.
When I hear about things like that,
If there is even a slim chance,
I really do not want that to ever happen.
We can all just go together.
If it is not just you two, it would not be a date.
So the jinx will not kick in.
Hey, what do you think you are doing?
Takeo-kun, do you know they have a parade?
I really wanted to see it with you...
Of course you will go, too, right?
Okay, that is all decided, then!
Give me your contact info, everyone.
You are trying way too hard.
I am so excited about tomorrow.
I have to think about what to wear.
There is a ride that is super fast.
She is really girly, is not she?
I will send out a text about when and where we are meeting.
Why did you tell him about Takeo?
It was a social event for my seminar,
and someone said he could do hypnosis.
You should be wary of hypnosis, too.
You really took me by surprise.
That is bad for my heart.
Oh, I texted everyone about tomorrow.
Oh, I am trying to figure out where I will be staying tonight.
I only had my hotel booked till yesterday.
He came here for Ai, huh?
I guess a net cafe or a manga cafe.
You can just stay with me.
He will be staying over tonight.
I am sorry to bother you so suddenly.
It is nice to have so many side dishes all out at once.
I am living on my own, so I miss home cooking.
Oh, you must be Takeo's father.
I am Oda, a friend of Takeo's.
Does stuff like this happen often?
Your parents did not seem to care at all.
Did not you find Sunakawa-san scary at first?
I am kind of loose and laid-back,
so I just laugh things off,
I will be your errand-boy if you will pass me!
I guess I had it coming...
I lost really important documents for my seminar,
He was so mad, he said he would not let me graduate.
girls usually act nice and sympathize, but...
That is why I told you not to weasel your way out of everything.
Do not try to pass it off!
I am sorry I am deeply sorry
For whatever reason, she came to apologize with me,
and she even found the documents.
You did not look hard enough.
Maybe I will call her Sis.
but she was in the same year.
I could not stop using honorifics, though.
When did I first meet her?
As far back as I can remember, she was always around.
Wait, why are you wearing your undershirt on top?
I bet I would have gone through elementary school
I am fine if she loves someone else...
I just want to embrace her, feelings and all.
But she will not fall into my hands...
He is a man, all right.
Why are you at Takeo's place?
He let me stay with him.
Takeo-kun goes to sleep real early, does not he?
Why do you have that with you?
Sunakawa-san, when we go to MM Land today,
I am going to separate Takeo and Yamato-san.
I will make sure you two can be alone,
so you should tell him how you feel.
You said you are fine, but that is a lie.
You cannot move on because you never told him.
Please tell him and get some closure.
